Package com.dua3.utility.fx

Class FxFontUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.FxFontUtil
All Implemented Interfaces:
FontUtil<javafx.scene.text.Font>
public final class FxFontUtil extends Object implements FontUtil<javafx.scene.text.Font>
Utility class for working with fonts in JavaFX.

    • getFontData

      public static FontData getFontData(javafx.scene.text.Font fxFont)
      Extracts font data from a JavaFX Font object.
      Parameters:
      fxFont - the JavaFX Font object from which the font data is extracted
      Returns:
      a FontData object containing detailed information about the font, including its family, size, style attributes such as bold, italic, underline, and strike-through, and additional metrics like ascent, descent, height, and space width

    • getFontDef

      public static FontDef getFontDef(javafx.scene.text.Font fxFont)
      Extracts font characteristics from a JavaFX Font object and creates a corresponding FontDef object.
      Parameters:
      fxFont - the JavaFX Font object to be analyzed
      Returns:
      a FontDef object containing the extracted font properties such as family, size, bold, italic, underline, and strikethrough

    • deriveFont

      public Font deriveFont(Font font, FontDef fontDef)
      Description copied from interface: FontUtil
      Derives a new Font object based on a given font and font definition specifications.
      Specified by:
      deriveFont in interface FontUtil<javafx.scene.text.Font>
      Parameters:
      font - the original Font object to be used as a base for deriving the new font
      fontDef - the font definition detailing the specific attributes to modify or apply
      Returns:
      a new Font object derived from the original font with modifications specified by the font definition
